name: part_009
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】The First Note【 #⁠音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025 】#hololiveDEV_IS #ReGLOSS [mt8AyISL9Ig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'アカシア' (Acacia).
MC section after the song performance, celebrating Kanade's birthday.

subtitles.original: ゴールはきっとまだだけど
subtitles.english: The goal is surely still far off, but

subtitles.original: もう死ぬまでいたい場所にいる
subtitles.english: I'm already in the place where I want to stay until I die

subtitles.original: 隣で　君の側で
subtitles.english: By your side, right next to you

subtitles.original: 魂がここだよと叫ぶ
subtitles.english: My soul cries out that it's right here

subtitles.original: 泣いたり笑ったりする時
subtitles.english: When we cry or laugh together

subtitles.original: 君の命が揺れる時
subtitles.english: When your life trembles

subtitles.original: 誰より特等席で
subtitles.english: In the best seat of all

subtitles.original: 僕も同じように息をしていたい
subtitles.english: I want to be breathing just like you

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, yeah, aha
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, yeah, aha

subtitles.original: 君の一歩は僕より遠い
subtitles.english: Your stride is longer than mine

subtitles.original: 間違いなく君の凄いところ
subtitles.english: That's definitely one of your amazing points

subtitles.original: 足跡は僕の方が多い
subtitles.english: But I've left more footprints behind

subtitles.original: 間違いなく僕の凄いところ
subtitles.english: That's definitely one of my amazing points

subtitles.original: 真っ暗闇が怖い時は
subtitles.english: When you're afraid of the pitch black darkness

subtitles.original: 怖さを比べ　ふざけながら行こう
subtitles.english: Let's compare our fears and move on jokingly

subtitles.original: 太陽が無くたって歩ける
subtitles.english: I can walk even without the sun

subtitles.original: 君と照らす世界が見える
subtitles.english: I can see the world you light up

subtitles.original: 言えない事聞かないままで
subtitles.english: Without asking about the things you can't say

subtitles.original: 消えない傷の意味知らないままで
subtitles.english: Without knowing the meaning of your indelible scars

subtitles.original: でも目が合えば笑えるのさ
subtitles.english: But we can smile if our eyes meet

subtitles.original: 涙を挟んでも
subtitles.english: Even with tears between us

subtitles.original: 転んだら手を貸してもらうよりも
subtitles.english: Rather than having a hand lent when I fall

subtitles.original: 優しい言葉選んでもらうよりも
subtitles.english: Rather than having kind words chosen for me

subtitles.original: 隣で信じて欲しいんだ
subtitles.english: I want you to believe in me by my side

subtitles.original: どこまでも一緒に行けると
subtitles.english: That we can go anywhere together

subtitles.original: ついに辿り着くその時
subtitles.english: When we finally reach the destination

subtitles.original: 夢の正体に触れる時
subtitles.english: When we touch the true form of our dreams

subtitles.original: 必ず一番側で
subtitles.english: I'll surely be closest to you

subtitles.original: 君の目に映る景色にいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be in the scenery reflected in your eyes

subtitles.original: あの輝きを
subtitles.english: That brilliance

subtitles.original: 君に会えたから見えた
subtitles.english: I saw it because I met you

subtitles.original: あの輝きを確かめに行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go and confirm that brilliance

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, yeah, aha
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, yeah, aha

subtitles.original: どんな最後が待っていようと
subtitles.english: No matter what kind of end awaits

subtitles.original: もう離せない手を繋いだよ
subtitles.english: I've held your hand and won't let go

subtitles.original: 隣で　隣で　君の側で
subtitles.english: By your side, right next to you

subtitles.original: 魂がここだよと叫ぶ
subtitles.english: My soul cries out that it's right here

subtitles.original: そして理由が光る時
subtitles.english: And when the reason shines

subtitles.original: 僕らを理由が抱きしめる時
subtitles.english: When the reason embraces us

subtitles.original: 誰より近くで特等席で
subtitles.english: Closer than anyone, in the best seat

subtitles.original: 僕の見た君を君に伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell you about the you that I saw

subtitles.original: 君がいることを君に伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell you that you are here

subtitles.original: そうやって始まったんだよ
subtitles.english: That's how it all began

subtitles.original: そうやって始まったんだよ
subtitles.english: That's how it all began

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, yeah, aha
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, yeah, aha

subtitles.original: うわぁー！ママたちが来たぞー！
subtitles.english: Whoa! The mamas are here!

subtitles.original: ママたちー！奏ちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Mamas! Kanade-chan!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: おめでたい！おめでたい！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday! Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: おめでたいおめでたいおめでたいおめでたい...
subtitles.english: Happy birthday, happy birthday, happy birthday...

subtitles.original: 騒がしいなあ。
subtitles.english: So noisy.

subtitles.original: お前に言われたくねーわ。
subtitles.english: I don't want to hear that from you.

subtitles.original: 確かに！奏ちゃんが一番浮き浮きしてんじゃんねえ。
subtitles.english: True! Kanade-chan is the most excited one.

subtitles.original: だって、だって誕生日だから！
subtitles.english: Because, because it's my birthday!

subtitles.original: そうだよね！
subtitles.english: That's true!

subtitles.original: お母さんたち、産んでくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Mamas, thank you for giving birth to me!

subtitles.original: 産んでは、産んではない！
subtitles.english: I didn't, I didn't give birth!

subtitles.original: 産んではない！その誤解やめて！
subtitles.english: I didn't give birth! Stop that misunderstanding!

subtitles.original: こちらこそだよ！
subtitles.english: Same here!

subtitles.original: こちらこそだよ！
subtitles.english: Same here!

subtitles.original: どこ産んでんねん。
subtitles.english: Where did I give birth?

subtitles.original: ど、どこも産んでません。
subtitles.english: W-We didn't give birth to anything.

subtitles.original: 流石に、ママ、ママですけど産んでません。
subtitles.english: We're mamas, but we didn't give birth.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Right!

subtitles.original: そして今日は何話すんですか、ここから？
subtitles.english: And what are we talking about today, from here?

subtitles.original: そうですね、えっと、これまでのコラボの感想を...
subtitles.english: Well, let's see, reflections on our collaborations so far...

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃある。
subtitles.english: There are so many.

subtitles.original: 覚えきれてんのかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if she remembers them all?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫かな？
subtitles.english: Is she okay?

subtitles.original: ゆ、言うていい？
subtitles.english: C-Can I say it?

subtitles.original: じゃあ一番印象深かったの何？奏ちゃんが。
subtitles.english: Then, what was the most memorable one for you, Kanade-chan?

subtitles.original: 気になる！
subtitles.english: I'm curious!

subtitles.original: でも言うて、このママたちでやったコラボって、実は一個しかないんです。
subtitles.english: But to be honest, there's actually only one collaboration we've done as this 'mamas' group.

subtitles.original: ああー！確かに！
subtitles.english: Ah! True!

subtitles.original: あ、そっかあ。
subtitles.english: Oh, right.

subtitles.original: あれ？でもそういえばなんか、赤い髪の毛の人...
subtitles.english: Huh? But come to think of it, someone with red hair...

subtitles.original: あれ？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: 今日いない。
subtitles.english: She's not here today.

subtitles.original: やっぱりアレじゃない？産んだとか言うから...
subtitles.english: Isn't it because she said she gave birth...?

subtitles.original: あ、それだ。それでちょっと来られないのは...
subtitles.english: Ah, that's it. That's why she couldn't come...

subtitles.original: あ、でもなんか、スケジュール的に...
subtitles.english: Oh, but like, due to scheduling...

subtitles.original: あ、そうなんだ。
subtitles.english: Oh, I see.

subtitles.original: 一応聞いてみたんですけど、ちょっと都合が合わず...
subtitles.english: I did ask her, but unfortunately our schedules didn't line up...

subtitles.original: あ、忙しい。
subtitles.english: Ah, busy.
